name: Desert Rush (CookingLapin)
description:
Game created for the Boss Rush game jam.

The world is dying and humanity's last hope is about to take off as the spaceship Normandy is planned to leave the planet towards a new Home. A terrible bandit is however on his way to seize this ship for himself, and only you can stop him!

Drive through post-apocalyptic landscapes and fight Zmur the warlord and his armies.

This is my first time designing bosses, I'm afraid I bit more than I can chew but I hope you'll enjoy your time in the wastelands nonetheless !

Some music credits :

I Can’t Stop by Punch Deck | https://soundcloud.com/punch-deck

Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
